1: <sup>1</sup> Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways.
2: <sup>2</sup> For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
3: <sup>3</sup> Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
4: <sup>4</sup> Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD.
5: <sup>5</sup> The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
6: <sup>6</sup> Yea, thou shalt see thy children’s children, and peace upon Israel.
